description: Newton Nordic AB develops products for stabilization and remote control of moving cameras. The company is headquartered in Linkoping, Ostergotland. The company went IPO on 2015-01-13. The company provides NEWTON camera stabilization systems and complete moving camera solutions, both proprietary technologies, to service providers, TV-channels, broadcasters and rental houses. The system enables to capture shots from a variety of moving devices, such as cable cams, towers, rails, cranes, jib arms and vehicles, among others, during live broadcast and can be integrated with both cameras and broadcast facilities.
naicsNationalIndustry: Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing
name: Newton Nordic AB
